verses.english: By those [angels] lined up in rows
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da mãsu yin sahu-sahu (a cikin salla kõ yãƙi).

verses.english: And those who drive [the clouds]
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan mãsu yin tsãwa dõmin gargaɗi.

verses.english: And those who recite the message,
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan da mãsu karãtun abin tunãtarwa.

verses.english: Indeed, your God is One,
verses.hausa: Lalle Abin bautawarku haƙĩƙa ¦aya ne.

verses.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ
verses.english: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.
verses.hausa: Ubangijin sammai da ƙasã da abin da ke tsakãninsu, kuma Ubangijin wurãren fitar rãnã.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.english: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mun ƙãwatãr da sama ta kusa da wata ƙawa, watau taurãri.

verses.english: And as protection against every rebellious devil
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã tsari daga dukan Shaiɗan mai tsaurin kai.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.english: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,
verses.hausa: Bã zã su iya saurãre zuwa ga jama'a mafi ɗaukaka (Malã'iku) ba, kuma anã jĩfar su daga kõwane gẽfe.

verses.english: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,
verses.hausa: Dõmin tunkuɗẽwa kuma sunã da wata azãba tabbatacciya.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.english: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].
verses.hausa: Fãce wanda ya fizgi wata kalma, sai yũla mai haske ta bĩ shi.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ
verses.english: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
verses.hausa: Ka tambaye su: "Shin sũ ne mafi wuya ga halittawa, kõ, kuwa waɗanda Muka halitta?" Lalle Mũ, Mun halitta su daga lãkã mai ɗauri.

verses.english: But you wonder, while they mock,
verses.hausa: Ã'a, kã yi mãmãki, alhãli kuwa sunã ta yin izgili.

verses.english: And when they are reminded, they remember not.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan aka tunãtar da su, bã su tunãwa.

verses.english: And when they see a sign, they ridicule
verses.hausa: Idan suka ga wata ãyã, sai su dinga yin izgili.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
verses.hausa: Kuma su ce, "Wannnan bã kõme ba, fãce sihiri, ne bayyananne."

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.english: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
verses.hausa: "Shin, idan mun mutu, kuma muka kasance turɓaya da kasũsuwa, ashe, lalle mũ tabbas waɗandaake tãyarwa ne?

verses.english: And our forefathers [as well]?"
verses.hausa: "Ashe kõ da ubanninmu na farko?"

verses.english: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Na'am alhãli kuwa kunã ƙasƙantattu."

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.english: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
verses.hausa: Tsãwa guda kawai ce, sai gã su, sunã dũbi.

verses.english: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
verses.hausa: Kuma su ce: "Yã bonenmu! Wannan ita ce rãnar sakamako."

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
verses.hausa: Wannan ita ce rãnar rarrabẽwa wadda kuka kasance kuna ƙaryatãwa.

verses.arabic: ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
verses.hausa: Ku tãra waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, da abõkan haɗinsu, da abin da suka kasance sunã bautãwa.

verses.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
verses.hausa: Wanin Allah, sabõda haka ku shiryar da su zuwa ga hanyar Jahĩm.

verses.english: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
verses.hausa: Kuma ku tsayar da su, lalle su, waɗanda ake yi wa tambaya ne.

verses.english: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
verses.hausa: Me ya sãme ku, bã ku taimakon jũna?

verses.english: But they, that Day, are in surrender.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sũ a yau, mãsu sallamãwa ne.

verses.english: And they will approach one another blaming each other.
verses.hausa: Kuma sãshensu ya fuskanta ga sãshe, sunã tambayar jũna.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.english: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle kũ, kun kasance kunã jẽ mana daga wajen dãma (inda muka amince)."

verses.english: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ã'a, ba ku kasance mũminai ba.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ
verses.english: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
verses.hausa: "Kuma wani dalĩli bai kasance ba gare mu a kanku. Ã'a, kun kasance mutãne ne mãsu kẽtare iyãka."

verses.arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
verses.english: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka maganar Ubangijinmu ta wajaba a kanmu. Lalle mũ, mãsu ɗanɗanãwa ne."

verses.english: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
verses.hausa: "Sabõda haka muka ɓatar da ku. Lalle mũ, mun kasance ɓatattu."

verses.english: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
verses.hausa: To lalle sũ a rãnar nan, mãsu tãrayya ne a cikin azãbar.

verses.english: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, kamar haka Muke aikatãwa game, da mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.english: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
verses.hausa: Lalle sũ, sun kasance idan an ce musu: "Bãbu abin bautãwa, fãce Allah," sai su dõra girman kai.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
verses.english: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã cẽwa, "Shin, mũ lalle mãsu barin gumãkanmu ne, sabõda maganar wani mawãƙi mahaukaci?

verses.english: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, yã zo da gaskiya kuma ya gaskata Manzanni.

verses.english: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,
verses.hausa: Lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa mãsu ɗanɗana azãba mai raɗaɗi ne.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
verses.hausa: Kuma bã zã a sãka muku ba fãce da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

verses.english: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.hausa: Fãce bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

verses.english: Those will have a provision determined -
verses.hausa: Waɗannan sunã da abinci sananne.

verses.english: Fruits; and they will be honored
verses.hausa: 'Ya'yan itãcen marmari, kuma sunã waɗanda ake girmamãwa.

verses.english: In gardens of pleasure
verses.hausa: A cikin gidãjen Aljannar ni'ima.

verses.english: On thrones facing one another.
verses.hausa: A kan karagu, sunã mãsu fuskantar jũna.

verses.english: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
verses.hausa: Anã kẽwayãwa a kansu da hinjãlan giya, ta daga waɗansu marẽmari.

verses.english: White and delicious to the drinkers;
verses.hausa: Farã mai dãɗi ga mashãyan.

verses.arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.english: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
verses.hausa: A cikinta bãbu jirĩ kuma ba su zama mãsu mãye daga gare ta ba,

verses.english: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,
verses.hausa: Kuma a wurinsu, akwai mãtan aure mãsu taƙaita kallonsu, mãsu manyan idãnu.

verses.english: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
verses.hausa: Kamar dai su ƙwai ne ɓõyayye.

verses.english: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
verses.hausa: Sai sãshensu ya fuskanta a kan sãshe, sunã tambayar jũna.

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ
verses.english: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
verses.hausa: Wani mai magana daga cikinsu ya ce: "Lalle ni wani abõki ya kasance a gare ni (a dũniya)."

verses.english: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe
verses.hausa: Yanã cewa, "Shin, kai lalle, kanã daga mãsu gaskatãwa ne?"

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.english: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
verses.hausa: "Ashe, idan muka mutu, kuma muka, kasance turɓaya da kasũsuwa, ashe, lalle, mũ tabbas waɗanda ake sãka wa ne?"

verses.english: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
verses.hausa: (Mai maganar) ya ce: "Shin, kõ ku, mãsu tsinkãya ne (mu gan shi)?"

verses.english: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Sai ya tsinkãya, sai ya gan shi a cikin tsakar Jahim.

verses.english: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.
verses.hausa: Ya ce (masa), "Wallahi, lalle, kã yi kusa, haƙĩƙã, ka halakãni."

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.english: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
verses.hausa: "Kuma bã dõmin ni'imar Ubangijĩna ba, lalle, dã na kasance daga waɗanda ake halartarwa (tãre da kai a cikin wutã)."

verses.english: Then, are we not to die
verses.hausa: "Shin fa, ba mu zama mãsu mutuwa ba."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.english: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
verses.hausa: "Sai mutuwarmu ta farko, kuma ba mu zama waɗanda ake azabtarwa ba?"

verses.english: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
verses.hausa: Lalle, wannan shĩ ne babban rabo mai girma.

verses.english: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
verses.hausa: Sabõda irin wannan, sai mãsu aiki su yi ta aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.english: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
verses.hausa: Shin wancan shĩ ne mafi zama alhẽri ga liyafa kõ itãciyar zaƙƙũm?

verses.english: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Lalle, Mũ, Mun sanya ta fitina ga. azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
verses.hausa: Lalle ita wata itãciya ce wadda take fita daga asalin Jahĩm.

verses.english: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
verses.hausa: Gundarta, kamar dai shi kãnun Shaiɗan ne.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
verses.hausa: To, lalle sũ haƙĩƙa mãsu ci ne daga gare ta. Sa'an nan mãsu cika cikuna ne daga gare ta.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.english: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan lalle sunã da wani garwaye a kanta, daga ruwan zãfi.

verses.english: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan lalle makomarsu, haƙĩƙa, zuwa ga Jãhĩm take.

verses.english: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
verses.hausa: Lalle sũ, sun iske ubanninsu batattu.

verses.english: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka sũ, a kan gurãbunsu, suke gaggãwa.

verses.english: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
verses.hausa: Kuma tabbas haƙĩƙa mafi yawan mutãnen farko sun ɓace a gabãninsu.

verses.english: And We had already sent among them warners.
verses.hausa: Kuma tabbas haƙĩƙa, Mun aika mãsu gargaɗi a cikinsu.

verses.english: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
verses.hausa: Sai ka dũba yadda ãƙibar waɗanda aka yi wa gargaɗi ta kasance.

verses.english: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.hausa: Fãce bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

verses.english: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa' Nũhu ya kira Mu. To, madalla da mãsu karɓãwa, Mu.

verses.english: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun tsĩrar da shi da mutãnensa daga bakin ciki babba.

verses.english: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
verses.hausa: Muka sanya zurriyarsa sunã mãsu wanzuwa.

verses.english: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bar masa (yabo) a cikin jama'ar ƙarshe.

verses.english: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
verses.hausa: Aminci ya tabbata ga Nũhu, a cikin halittu.

verses.english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.hausa: Lalle shi, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

verses.english: Then We drowned the disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Sã'an nan Muka nutsar da waɗansunsu.

verses.english: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle daga ƙungiyarsa, haƙĩƙa, Ibrahĩm yake.

verses.english: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ya je wa dangijinsa da zũciya kuɓutacciya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ya ce wa ubansa da mutãnensa, "Mẽne ne kuke bautãwa?"

verses.english: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
verses.hausa: "Shin, ƙiren ƙarya (wãtau) gumãka, wanin Allah, kuke bautãwa?"

verses.english: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
verses.hausa: "To, mẽne ne zatonku game da Ubangijin halittu?"

verses.english: And he cast a look at the stars
verses.hausa: Sai ya yi dũbi, dũba ta sõsai, a cikin taurãri.

verses.english: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
verses.hausa: Sã'an nan ya ce: "Nĩ mai rashin lãfiya ne."

verses.english: So they turned away from him, departing.
verses.hausa: Sai suka jũya ga barinsa, sunã mãsu jũyãwa da bãya.

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
verses.hausa: Sai ya karkata zuwa ga gumãkansu, sa'an nan ya ce: "Ashe bã zã ku ci ba?

verses.english: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
verses.hausa: "Me ya sãme ku, bã ku magana?"

verses.english: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
verses.hausa: Sai ya zuba dũka a kansu da hannun dãma.

verses.english: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
verses.hausa: Sai suka fuskanto zuwa gare shi, sunã gaggãwa.

verses.english: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
verses.hausa: Ya ce, "Kunã bauta wa abin da kuke sassaƙawa,

verses.english: While Allah created you and that which you do?"
verses.hausa: "Alhãli, Allah ne Ya halitta ku game da abin da kuke aikatãwa?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ku gina wani gini sabõda shi, sa'an nan ku jẽfa shi a cikin Jahĩm."

verses.english: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka suka yi nufin makĩda game da shi. Sai Muka sanya su, sũ ne mafi ƙasƙanci.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.english: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
verses.hausa: Kuma (Ibrahĩm] ya ce: "Lalle, nĩ mai tafiya ne zuwa ga Ubangijĩna, zai shiryar da ni."

verses.english: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
verses.hausa: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka bã ni (abõkin zama) daga sãlihan mutãne."

verses.english: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka yi masa bushãra da wani yãro mai haƙuri.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da ya isa aiki tãre da shi, ya ce: "Ya ƙaramin ɗãna! Lalle ne inã gani, a ciki barci, lalle inã yanka ka. To, ka dũba mẽ ka gani?" (Yãron) ya ce: "Ya, Bãbãna! Ka aikata abin da aka umurce ka, zã ka sãme ni, in Allah Ya so, daga mãsu haƙuri."

verses.english: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da suka yi sallama, (Ibrahĩm) ya kãyar da shi ga gẽfen gõshinsa.

verses.english: We called to him, "O Abraham,
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka kira shi cẽwa "Ya Ibrahĩm!"

verses.arabic: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: "Haƙĩƙa kã gaskata mafarkin." Lalle kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
verses.hausa: Lalle wannan ita ce jarrabãwa bayyananna.

verses.english: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi fansar yãron da wani abin yanka, mai girma.

verses.english: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a kansa a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe.

verses.english: "Peace upon Abraham."
verses.hausa: Aminci ya tabbata ga Ibrãhĩm.

verses.english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.hausa: Lalle shĩ, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

verses.english: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi masa bushãra Da Is'hãƙa ya zama Annabi daga sãlihan mutãne.

verses.arabic: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ
verses.english: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi albarka a gare shi, kuma ga Is'hãka. Kuma daga cikin zurriyarsu akwai mai kyautatãwa da kuma maizãlunci dõmin kansa, mai bayyanãwa (ga zãluncin).

verses.english: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, Mun yi ni'ima ga Mũsã da Hãrũna.

verses.english: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka tsĩrar da su da mutãnensu daga bakin ciki mai girma.

verses.english: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka taimake su, sabõda haka suka kasance mãsu rinjãya.

verses.english: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ba su Littãfi mai iyãkar bayãni.

verses.english: And We guided them on the straight path.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka shiryar da su ga hanya mĩƙaƙƙiya.

verses.english: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a gare su a cikin mutãnen karshe.

verses.english: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."
verses.hausa: Aminci ya tabbata ga Mũsã da Hãruna.

verses.english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Lalle kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
verses.hausa: Lalle, sunã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

verses.english: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Ilyãs, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

verses.english: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da yake ce wa mutãnensa, "Ashe, bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.english: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -
verses.hausa: "Shin, kunã bauta wa Ba'al ne, kuma kunã barin Mafi kyautatãwar mãsu halitta?"

verses.english: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
verses.hausa: "Allah Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku farko?"

verses.english: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
verses.hausa: Sai suka ƙaryata shi. Sabõda haka sũ lalle waɗanda zã a halartãwa ne (a wutã).

verses.english: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.hausa: Sai bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

verses.english: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a gare shi, a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe.

verses.english: "Peace upon Elias."
verses.hausa: Aminci ya tabbata ga Ilyãs.

verses.english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

verses.english: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.hausa: Lalle shĩ, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

verses.english: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Lũdu, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

verses.english: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da Muka tsĩrar da shi, da mutãnensa gabã ɗaya.

verses.english: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
verses.hausa: Sai wata tsõhuwa tanã a cikin mãsu wanzuwa (a cikin azãba).

verses.english: Then We destroyed the others.
verses.hausa: Sã'an nan Muka darkãke waɗansu mutãnen.

verses.english: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa, kunã shũɗewa a kansu, kunã mãsu asubanci.

verses.english: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
verses.hausa: Kuma da dare. Shin fa, bã zã ku hankalta ba?

verses.english: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Yũnusa, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

verses.english: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ya gudu zuwa ga jirgin ruwa wanda aka yi wa lõdi.

verses.english: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
verses.hausa: Sã'an nan ya yi ƙuri'a, sai ya kasance a cikin waɗanda aka rinjaya.

verses.english: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
verses.hausa: Sai kĩfi ya yi lõma da shi, alhãli kuwa yanã wanda ake zargi.

verses.english: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
verses.hausa: To, ba dõmin lalle shi ya kasance daga mãsu tasbĩhi ba,

verses.arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.english: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
verses.hausa: Lalle dã ya zauna a cikin cikinsa har ya zuwa rãnar da zã a tãyar da su.

verses.english: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka jẽfa shi ga wani fĩli alhãli kuwa yanã mai raunin rashin lãfiya.

verses.english: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka tsirar da wata itãciya ta kankana a kusa da shi.

verses.arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.english: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka aika shi zuwa ga waɗansu mutãne dubuɗari, kõ sunã ƙaruwa (a kan haka).

verses.english: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
verses.hausa: Sai suka yi ĩmãni sabõda haka Muka jiyar da su dãdi har wani lõkaci.

verses.english: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka tambaye su, "Shin, Ubangijinka ne da 'ya'ya mãtã, kuma su da ɗiya maza?"

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.english: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
verses.hausa: Kõ kuma Mun halitta malã'iku mãtã ne, alhãli kuwa sũ sunãhalarce?

verses.english: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
verses.hausa: To! Lalle sũ, daga ƙiren ƙaryarsu sunã cẽwa.

verses.english: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
verses.hausa: "Allah Yã haihu," alhãli kuwa lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa maƙaryata ne.

verses.english: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
verses.hausa: Shin, Yã zãɓi 'yã'ya mãtã ne a kan ɗiya maza?

verses.english: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
verses.hausa: Mẽ ya same ku? Yãya kuke hukuntãwa (wannanhukunci)?

verses.english: Then will you not be reminded?
verses.hausa: Shin, bã ku tunãni?

verses.english: Or do you have a clear authority?
verses.hausa: Ko kuma kunã da wani dalĩli bayyananne ne?

verses.english: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
verses.hausa: To, ku zo da littãfinku idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.english: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
verses.hausa: Kuma suka sanya nasaba a tsakãninSa da tsakãnin aljannu. Alhãli kuwa Lalle aljannu sun sani, "Lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa waɗanda ake halartarwa ne (a cikin wutã.)"

verses.english: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
verses.hausa: Tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah daga abin da suke siffantãwa.

verses.english: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
verses.hausa: Sai bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

verses.english: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
verses.hausa: To, lalle, ku da abin da kuke bautãwa,

verses.english: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
verses.hausa: Ba ku zama mãsu buwãya ba a gare Shi.

verses.english: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Sai wanda yake mai shiga babbar wutã Jahĩm.

verses.arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.english: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
verses.hausa: "Kuma bãbu kõwa daga cikinmu, fãce yanã da matsayi sananne."

verses.english: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle mu, haƙĩƙa, mũ ne mãsu yin sahu-sahu (dõmin ibãda)."

verses.english: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle mũ haƙĩƙa, mũ ne mãsu yin tasbĩhi."

verses.english: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle sũ, sun kasance sunã cẽwa,

verses.arabic: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
verses.hausa: "Dã lalle munã da wani littãfi irin na mutãnen farko."

verses.english: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
verses.hausa: "Lalle dã mun kasance bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake."

verses.english: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
verses.hausa: Sai suka kãfirta da shi. Sabõda haka zã su sani.

verses.english: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa kalmarMu ta gabãta ga bãyinMu, Manzanni.

verses.english: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
verses.hausa: Lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa, sũ ne waɗanda ake taimako.

verses.english: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle rundunarMu, haƙĩƙa, sũ ne marinjaya.

verses.english: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka juya daga barinsu, har a wani lõkaci.

verses.english: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
verses.hausa: Ka nũna musu (gaskiya), da haka zã su dinga gani.

verses.english: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
verses.hausa: Shin fa, da azabarMu suke nẽman gaggãwa?

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.english: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
verses.hausa: To, idan ta sauka ga farfãjiyarsu, to, sãfiyar wadanda ake yi wa gargaɗi ta mũnana.

verses.english: And leave them for a time.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka jũya daga barinsu har a wani lõkaci.

verses.english: And see, for they are going to see.
verses.hausa: Ka nũna (musu gaskiya), da haka zã su dinga nũnãwa.

verses.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
verses.hausa: Tsarki ya tabbata ga Ubangijinka, Ubangijin rinjãye, daga barin abin da suke siffantãwa.

verses.english: And peace upon the messengers.
verses.hausa: Kuma aminci ya tabbata ga Manzanni.

verses.english: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin halittu.
